mapper.select: SELECT seat.sid,seat.fid,seat.row,seat.leftside,seat.columns,seat.seatnumber,seat.statue FROM seat,floor WHERE (SELECT COUNT(1) as num FROM booking WHERE booking.sid=seat.sid AND TO_DAYS(NOW())=TO_DAYS(booking.bstime) )=0 AND seat.fid=floor.fid AND floor.statue=0 AND seat.statue=0 AND floor.fid=#{fid} ORDER BY seat.sid

SELECT booking.bid,booking.sno,booking.bstime,booking.betime,booking.sid,booking.stime,booking.etime,booking.statue,booking.deal,seat.fid,seat.leftside,seat.row,seat.columns,seat.seatnumber FROM booking,seat WHERE TO_DAYS(NOW())=TO_DAYS(booking.stime) AND booking.statue !=0 AND booking.statue !=3 AND booking.sid=seat.sid AND seat.fid=#{fid} ORDER BY seat.sid

SELECT seat.sid,seat.fid,seat.row,seat.leftside,seat.columns,seat.seatnumber,seat.statue FROM seat,floor WHERE (SELECT COUNT(1) as num FROM booking WHERE booking.sid=seat.sid AND TO_DAYS(NOW())=TO_DAYS(booking.bstime)) > 0 AND seat.fid=floor.fid AND floor.statue=0 AND seat.statue=0 AND floor.fid=#{fid} ORDER BY seat.sid
SELECT bid,sno,bstime,betime,sid,stime,etime,statue,deal,delay FROM booking WHERE sid=#{sid} AND TO_DAYS(NOW())=TO_DAYS(bstime) AND UNIX_TIMESTAMP(betime)-UNIX_TIMESTAMP(NOW()) > 0
SELECT bid,sno,bstime,betime,sid,stime,etime,statue,deal,delay FROM booking WHERE sid=#{sid} AND TO_DAYS(NOW())+#{day}=TO_DAYS(bstime) AND UNIX_TIMESTAMP(betime)-UNIX_TIMESTAMP(NOW()) > 0
mapper.update: UPDATE booking SET stime=#{stime},statue=1 WHERE bid=#{bid}
UPDATE booking SET deal=#{deal},statue=#{statue} WHERE bid=#{bid}
mapper.select: SELECT bid,sno,bstime,betime,sid,stime,etime,statue,deal,delay FROM booking WHERE sno LIKE '${sno}' AND TO_DAYS(NOW())+#{date}=TO_DAYS(bstime)
SELECT bid,sno,bstime,betime,sid,stime,etime,statue,deal,delay FROM booking WHERE sno=#{sno} ORDER BY bstime DESC
SELECT bid,sno,bstime,betime,sid,stime,etime,statue,deal,delay FROM booking WHERE sno=#{sno} AND deal=#{deal} ORDER BY bstime DESC
SELECT DISTINCT(WEEKOFYEAR(bstime)) FROM booking WHERE YEAR(bstime)=YEAR(NOW()) ORDER BY WEEKOFYEAR(bstime)

SELECT booking.bid,booking.sno,booking.bstime,booking.betime,booking.sid,booking.stime,booking.etime,booking.statue,booking.deal,booking.delay FROM booking,seat WHERE seat.fid=#{fid} AND WEEKOFYEAR(booking.bstime)=#{week} AND booking.statue=3 AND booking.sid=seat.sid
SELECT DISTINCT(MONTH(bstime)) FROM booking

SELECT booking.bid,booking.sno,booking.bstime,booking.betime,booking.sid,booking.stime,booking.etime,booking.statue,booking.deal,booking.delay FROM booking,seat WHERE seat.fid=#{fid} AND MONTH(booking.bstime)=#{month} AND booking.statue=3 AND booking.sid=seat.sid

SELECT booking.bid,booking.sno,booking.bstime,booking.betime,booking.sid,booking.stime,booking.etime,booking.statue,booking.deal,booking.delay FROM booking,user WHERE user.college LIKE '${college}' AND booking.statue=3 AND booking.sno=user.sno

SELECT booking.bid,booking.sno,booking.bstime,booking.betime,booking.sid,booking.stime,booking.etime,booking.statue,booking.deal,booking.delay FROM booking,user WHERE user.college LIKE '${college}' AND user.major LIKE '${major}' AND booking.statue=3 AND booking.sno=user.sno

SELECT booking.bid,booking.sno,booking.bstime,booking.betime,booking.sid,booking.stime,booking.etime,booking.statue,booking.deal,booking.delay FROM booking,user WHERE user.college LIKE '${college}' AND user.major LIKE '${major}' AND user.classes LIKE '${classes}' AND booking.statue=3 AND booking.sno=user.sno
SELECT bid,sno,bstime,betime,sid,stime,etime,statue,deal,delay FROM booking WHERE MONTH(NOW())=MONTH(stime) AND statue=3 AND sno LIKE '${sno}'
SELECT DISTINCT(sno) FROM booking WHERE MONTH(NOW())=MONTH(stime) AND statue=3
SELECT bid,sno,bstime,betime,sid,stime,etime,statue,deal,delay FROM booking WHERE TO_DAYS(NOW())=TO_DAYS(bstime) AND statue !=3

SELECT seat.sid,seat.fid,seat.row,seat.leftside,seat.columns,seat.seatnumber,seat.statue FROM seat,floor WHERE (SELECT COUNT(1) as num FROM booking WHERE booking.sid=seat.sid AND (WEEKOFYEAR(NOW())-1)=WEEKOFYEAR(bstime)) > 0 AND seat.fid=floor.fid AND floor.fid=#{fid} ORDER BY seat.sid

SELECT booking.bid,booking.sno,booking.bstime,booking.betime,booking.sid,booking.stime,booking.etime,booking.statue,booking.deal,booking.delay FROM booking,seat WHERE seat.fid=#{fid} AND WEEKOFYEAR(booking.bstime)=(WEEKOFYEAR(NOW())-1) AND booking.sid=seat.sid

SELECT booking.bid,booking.sno,booking.bstime,booking.betime,booking.sid,booking.stime,booking.etime,booking.statue,booking.deal,booking.delay FROM booking,seat,user WHERE seat.fid=#{fid} AND WEEKOFYEAR(booking.bstime)=(WEEKOFYEAR(NOW())-1) AND booking.sid=seat.sid AND booking.sno=user.sno AND user.sno LIKE '${sno}'
SELECT bid,sno,bstime,betime,sid,stime,etime,statue,deal,delay FROM booking WHERE WEEKOFYEAR(bstime)=#{week} AND statue=3 AND sno LIKE '${sno}'
